resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1654674620</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Geography Game: PlaceSpotting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie-Spiel: PlaceSpotting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de Géographie : PlaceSpotting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo Da Geografia: PlaceSpotting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco Di Geografia: PlaceSpotting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι γεωγραφίας: PlaceSpotting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego De la Geografía: PlaceSpotting</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">PlaceSpotting is a new geography game based on Google Maps. You get a picture of a place somewhere on earth and some hints and have to find this place on a moveable Google map. You can also create new "map-riddles" for your friends.

The game started in Sitzerland and has already more than 3000 riddles stored
and more than 300'000 people tried to solve a riddle.

Main link: http://www.placespotting.com

Some direct links to special riddles:
http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126
http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124D
http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78

The page is in English, needs no registration and is free.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PlaceSpotting ist ein neues Geographiespiel, das 
auf Google Karten basiert. Sie erhalten eine Abbildung eines 
Platzes irgendwo auf Masse und einigen Tips und müssen diesen Platz 
auf einer beweglichen Google Karte finden. Sie können neue 
"Karte-Rätsel" für Ihr friends.The Spiel auch erstellen, das in 
Sitzerland begonnen wird und haben das bereits mehr als 3000 Rätsel 
storedand mehr als die Leute 300'000, die versucht werden, um ein 
riddle.Main Link zu lösen: http://www.placespotting.comSome 
direkte Links zur speziellen 
riddles:http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124Dhttp://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78The
Seite ist auf englisch, benötigt keine Registrierung und ist frei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">PlaceSpotting est un nouveau jeu de géographie 
basé sur des cartes de Google. Vous obtenez une image d'un 
endroit quelque part sur terre et quelques conseils et devez trouver 
cet endroit sur une carte mobile de Google. Vous pouvez 
également créer de nouvelles "carte-énigmes" pour votre jeu de 
friends.The commencé dans Sitzerland et avez le storedand de déjà 
plus de 3000 énigmes davantage que les personnes 300'000 jugées pour
résoudre un lien de riddle.Main : les liens directs de 
http://www.placespotting.comSome à la page spéciale de 
riddles:http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124Dhttp://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78The
est en anglais, n'a besoin d'aucun enregistrement et est libre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">PlaceSpotting é um jogo novo da geografia baseado
em mapas de Google. Você começa um retrato de um lugar em 
algum lugar na terra e nas algumas sugestões e tem que encontrar este
lugar em um mapa móvel de Google. Você pode também criar 
"mapa-map-riddles novos" para seu jogo de friends.The começado em 
Sitzerland e tem o storedand de já mais de 3000 riddles mais do que 
os povos 300'000 tentados resolver uma ligação de riddle.Main: 
as ligações diretas de http://www.placespotting.comSome à 
página especial de 
riddles:http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124Dhttp://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78The
estão em inglês, não necessitam nenhum registo e estão livres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">PlaceSpotting è un nuovo gioco di geografia 
basato sui programmi di Google. Ottenete un'immagine di un posto
in qualche luogo su terra e su alcuni suggerimenti e dovete trovare 
questo posto su un programma mobile di Google. Potete anche 
creare i nuovi "programma-map-riddles" per il vostro gioco di 
friends.The iniziato in Sitzerland ed avete storedand di già più di 
3000 riddles più della gente 300'000 provata per risolvere un 
collegamento di riddle.Main: i collegamenti diretti di 
http://www.placespotting.comSome alla pagina speciale di 
riddles:http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124Dhttp://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78The
è in inglese, non ha bisogno di registro ed è liberi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το PlaceSpotting είναι ένα νέο παιχνίδι γεωγραφίας
βασισμένο στους χάρτες Google. Παίρνετε μια εικόνα μιας 
θέσης κάπου στη γη και μερικούς υπαινιγμούς και πρέπει να βρείτε
αυτήν την θέση σε έναν κινητό χάρτη Google. Μπορείτε 
επίσης να δημιουργήσετε τα νέα "χάρτης-αινίγματα" για τους 
φίλους σας Το παιχνίδι άρχισε σε Sitzerland και έχει ήδη
περισσότερα από 3000 αινίγματα storedand περισσότερο από οι
άνθρωποι 300'000 προσπάθησαν να λύσουν μια βασική σύνδεση 
αινιγμάτων: http://www.placespotting.comSome οι άμεσες 
συνδέσεις με την ειδική σελίδα 
riddles:http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124Dhttp://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78The
είναι στα αγγλικά, δεν χρειάζονται καμία εγγραφή και είναι 
ελεύθερες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">PlaceSpotting es un nuevo juego de la geografía 
basado en las correspondencias de Google. Usted consigue un 
cuadro de un lugar en alguna parte en la tierra y algunas indirectas y
tiene que encontrar este lugar en una correspondencia movible de 
Google. Usted puede también crear nuevas 
"correspondencia-cribas" para su juego de friends.The comenzado en 
Sitzerland y tiene storedand de ya más de 3000 cribas más que la 
gente 300'000 intentada para solucionar una conexión de riddle.Main: 
las conexiones directas de http://www.placespotting.comSome a la
paginación especial de 
riddles:http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=41A-46B0A2DB-2126http://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=6DF-47338C3A-124Dhttp://www.placespotting.com/solve.php?placeId=436-46C231F5-A78The
están en inglés, no necesitan ningún registro y están libres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
